channel.title: HELP: Adding Yell and Crowns In A 562 RSPS
channel.description:
well as im tryin to get things ready for my client.jar launch when the time come i need the crown codes for admins owner and mods the standard gold and silver crowns
any coders wanna help?
562 revision Skype name: Randy.Lee.Rason PM or use skype please. will answer back!

item.title: HELP: Adding Yell and Crowns In A 562 RSPS
item.dc:creator: @noty noty
item.description:
@noty wrote:

Okay you’ll have to add this yell to your RSPS:

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
/*
This is the sensor for the yell command
/
/String text = playerCommand.substring(5);
String[] bad = {“chalreq”, “duelreq”, “tradereq”, “. com”, “c0m”, “com”,
“org”, “net”, “biz”, “. net”, “. org”, “. biz”,
“. no-ip”, “- ip”, “.no-ip.biz”, “no-ip.org”, “servegame”,
“.com”, “.net”, “.org”, “no-ip”, "", “is gay”, "**",
“crap”, “rubbish”, “. com”, “. serve”, “. no-ip”, “. net”, “. biz”};
for(int i = 0; i < bad.length; i++){
if(text.indexOf(bad[i]) >= 0){
return;
}
}/
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

						if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME HERE")) {
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=9440238>[Moderator]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME HERE")) {
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=16711680><shad=16711680>[Main Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +":<shad=65535></col> "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 1){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=65535><img=1>[Moderator "+c.playerName+"]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 2){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=14981889>[Administrator "+c.playerName+"]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 0){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Player]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
								
						}
					}
				}
			}  
    
    
}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: HELP: Adding Yell and Crowns In A 562 RSPS
